debt_section: As of December 31, 2023, Procter & Gamble Company had total debt of $41,037 million. The company's leverage ratio was 1.69x EBITDA. Management remains committed to maintaining investment-grade credit ratings and strong liquidity.
earnings_excerpt: Procter & Gamble Company reported strong results for fiscal year 2023. Operating margin was 14.9%, reflecting continued focus on operational efficiency. Management provided guidance for continued growth in the coming year.
